pages.text: Besaka jisa ne tuhade upara kura'ana di zimevari pa'i hai. Uha tuhanu ika cage natije te pahuca ke rahega. Akho, ki mera raba cagi tar'ham janada hai ki kihara maraga darasana lai ke a'i'a hai ate kihara pratakha kurahe pi'a hai
Ate tuhanu iha asa nahim si, ki tuhade upara kitaba utari javegi, paratu tuhade raba di kirapa nala utari ga'i. Tam tusim inakari'am de sathi na bano
Ate uha tuhanu alaha di'am a'itam tom roka na dena, jadom uha tuhade vala utari'am ja cuki'am hana. Ate tusim apane raba vala baî€¼ula'u ate sarika bana'una vali'am vica samila na hovo

Ate alaha de barabara kise dusare sarika nu na pukaro. Usa tom' binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim'. Hara ciza khatama hona vali hai binham usa hasati de. Phaisala use la'i hai ate tusim loka use vala vapisa kite javoge
ki loka iha samajhade hana ki uha sirafa iha kahina te chada dite janage ki asi' imana li'a'e ate unham nu parakhi'a na javega
Ate asim unham lokam nu parakhi'a hai jihare inham tom pahila sana. So alaha unham lokam nu samajha ke rahega jihare sace hana ate uha jhuthi'a nu vi zarura jana lavega
Ki jihare loka mare karama kara rahe hana uha samajhade hana ki uha isa tom baca janage. Bahuta baî€¼ura phaisala hai jihara uha kara rahe hana
Jihara bada alaha nu milana di umida rakhada hai tam alaha da va'ada zarura a'una vala hai. Ate uha sunana vala ate janana vala hai
Ate jihara bada mihanata karada hai, uha apane la'i hi karada hai. Besaka alaha sasara vali'am tom beparavaha hai
